jwtTokenKey: Securely accessing sensitive systems requires advanced measures. By combining upper and lowercase letters, numbers, and special symbols in a seemingly random arrangement, we ensure robust protection against unauthorized access. Using a unique combination of characters like sQ:[l=@Zkkv5a-Zd&@Q(36T*&r0R<amV^=..., security is enhanced by creating keys that are difficult to predict yet easy to integrate into modern cryptographic practices.
